title: PIC: Stormi dressed up as Kylie for Halloween – and we can't handle it!
text:
PIC: Stormi dressed up as Kylie for Halloween – and we can't handle it!

Cape Town – You'll remember Kylie Jenner's form-fitting bedazzled and feathered lilac Versace dress at the 2019 Met Gala.

The beauty mogul was serving lewks, completing the ensemble with a lavender wig, easily making her one of the best dressed in camp on the red carpet.

Now, though, we're not sure who wore it better, with Stormi channelling her mom for what we assume is Halloween.

The 22-year-old took to Instagram on Sunday sharing pictures of her baby girl dressed in a miniature version of the iconic dress.

"My baby! I can't handle this!" she wrote.

SEE THE POST HERE:

Stormi's dad, Travis Scott, left a heart emoji underneath the image while other users on Instagram praised "adorable" Stormi.

Another user added the praise hands emoji writing simply, "She won."

Compiled by Bashiera Parker (Sources: Instagram) (Photo: Getty Images and Instagram/kyliejenner)
